channel.title: Useful and less useful things
channel.description: My personal blog about building software, from the beginning to the end.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my first post on my new blog! How exciting! I’m sure I’ll write a lot more interesting things in the future.
item.content:encoded:
This is my first post on my new blog! How exciting!

I’m sure I’ll write a lot more interesting things in the future.
